entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:39 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 10:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: N 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or a few rain showers ending overnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming south 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 10:34 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 10:34 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
